products.title: Kling 3.0 DaVinci Resolve Plugin / Standalone App
products.description: Kling 3.0 for DaVinci Resolve brings AI-powered Image-to-Video and Video-to-Video transformation directly into professional post-production workflows. Powered by Kling AI's O3 Pro model via fal.ai, the plugin enables editors to generate motion from still images and transform existing footage using natural language prompts — fully integrated inside Resolve. Available as an OFX effect, Workflow integration panel, Fusion node, and standalone application.
products.requirements: DaVinci Resolve 20 (Free or Studio), fal.ai API key, macOS
products.author: Wayan Palmieri @ Kartel Labs
products.installInstructions:
1. Download and mount the DMG file
2. Launch the installer

This is macOS Gatekeeper blocking the unsigned .pkg. It happens because the installer isn't code-signed with an Apple Developer certificate. To open it:

Click Done (not "Move to Trash")
Go to System Settings > Privacy & Security
Scroll down — you'll see a message about the blocked .pkg with an "Open Anyway" button
Click Open Anyway

3. Launch DaVinci Resolve
4. Access Kling 3.0 as an OFX effect, Workflow panel, or Fusion node
5. Enter your fal.ai API key when prompted

LEGAL DISCLAIMER: AI-generated content outputs are provided as-is. Users are solely responsible for reviewing and approving all generated content before use. Users must ensure they have legal rights to all source materials used. AI outputs may not qualify for copyright protection in all jurisdictions. Processing uses third-party cloud infrastructure (Kling AI via fal.ai). This software is not affiliated with or endorsed by Blackmagic Design or DaVinci Resolve.
products.changelog: Initial release v1.7.5 - Image-to-Video and Video-to-Video AI transformation, Reference image support for style transfer, Element image insertion for characters/objects, Cloud-based processing via fal.ai, Available as OFX effect, Workflow panel, Fusion node, and standalone app
